decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to control the game by utilizing powerful planeswalkers and counterspells to disrupt the opponent's strategy while also having access to versatile removal spells. Atraxa, Grand Unifier serves as the commander to provide additional utility and support. The deck features a toolbox of spells like Counterspell, Force of Will, and Cryptic Command to counter threats and protect your own board. Additionally, the deck includes removal spells like Abrupt Decay, Fatal Push, and Swords to Plowshares to deal with creatures and problematic permanents. By efficiently controlling the game and disrupting the opponent's plans, this deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent to secure victory.

This deck focuses on aggressive strategies with low-cost, efficient creatures and disruptive spells to control the board. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly by deploying a wide array of threats and using equipment to boost their power. The commander, Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd, provides a consistent source of support and further enhances the aggressive game plan. With a mix of removal, protection, and card advantage, the deck aims to maintain pressure and tempo throughout the game while utilizing the commander's abilities to their fullest potential. The mana base is optimized for consistency and includes utility lands to support the aggressive playstyle.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively attack the opponent using a variety of creatures and spells with the goal of overwhelming them as quickly as possible. The commanders, Yoshimaru and Bruse Tarl, are both powerful in combat and can give bonuses to other attacking creatures. The deck includes a mix of efficient creatures like Kari Zev, Skyship Raider and powerful spells like Embercleave to quickly deal damage to the opponent. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon to disrupt the opponent's mana base and gain an advantage. Overall, the strategy of this deck is to be proactive and put pressure on the opponent early in the game.

The main concept of this deck is to assemble and execute powerful combos that can lead to overwhelming advantage and victory in a quick and efficient manner. The deck includes various pieces that work together to create explosive plays, utilizing cards like Demonic Tutor to search for key combo pieces, Reanimate to bring back important creatures, and Survival of the Fittest to set up the perfect hand. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Duress and Thoughtseize to control the opponent's resources and protect the combo. With a mix of ramp, removal, and powerful creatures like Tarmogoyf and Sheoldred, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure the win.
